meanings.definition: Having a pale or unhealthy complexion.
meanings.sent1: She looked even pastier than usual after being sick for a week.
meanings.sent2: The ghost in the movie had a pastier complexion than any of the other characters.
meanings.sent3: The vampire tried to get a tan but ended up even pastier than before.
meanings.sent4: The moonlight made her skin look pastier than a sheet of paper.
meanings.sent5: His face turned pastier with each passing minute, causing concern among his friends.
